name: Stay Put Survival
description:
This is Stay Put Survival, a casual survival game where you cannot move! Aim, craft and slay to try your best to survive and thrive against the enemies around you!

This game was made utilizing Scratch and turned into an executable via Turbowarp!

If you don't want to download the game (as it is a pretty hefty download), feel free to play online via the Turbowarp Portal! Keep in mind, you will not be able to save or load while in the online version!

[https://turbowarp.org/830452495?offscreen]
